plot: Kakeru Aizawa loves soccer, yet always lived in the shadow of his exceptionally talented brother and hence relegated himself to the position of manager. Kakeru's life changed however after a tragic accident.
title: Area no Kishi
plot_es: Kakeru Aizawa loves soccer, yet always lived in the shadow of his exceptionally talented brother and hence relegated himself to the position of manager. Kakeru's life changed however after a tragic accident.
plot_en: Kakeru Aizawa loves soccer, yet always lived in the shadow of his exceptionally talented brother and hence relegated himself to the position of manager. Kakeru's life changed however after a tragic accident.
